trans-unit.source: Provides generalized transformation support for 3-D objects.
trans-unit.target: 3차원 개체에 대한 일반화된 변환 지원을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Transformations between 3-D objects take place through the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A> methods, both of which return a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> object.
trans-unit.target: 3 차원 개체 사이의 변환을 통해 수행 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToAncestor%2A> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D.TransformToDescendant%2A> 반환 하는 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> 개체.

trans-unit.source: In the case that the transformation between the 3-D objects may be represented by a 4x4 matrix, the methods return an instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> class.
trans-unit.target: 3 차원 간의 변환 개체 4x4 행렬으로 표시 될 수 있는 경우 메서드는 인스턴스를 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MatrixTransform3D> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> class can transform a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> 클래스 변형할 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D>합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 이 개체 값의 전체 복사본을 만들어 이 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D" />의 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 소스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성이 <see langword="true." />인 경우에도 복제된 개체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성은 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 종속성 속성을 복사 하는 경우이 메서드 (이러한 요소는 더 이상 확인) 리소스 참조와 데이터 바인딩을 하지만 하지 애니메이션 또는 해당 현재 값을 복사 합니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Clone%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D" /> 개체의 현재 값에 대한 전체 복사본을 만들어 이 개체의 수정 가능한 복제본을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 리소스 참조, 데이터 바인딩 및 애니메이션은 복사되지 않지만 이러한 요소의 현재 값은 복사됩니다.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 소스의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성이 <see langword="false" />인 경우에도 복제된 개체의 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 속성은 <see langword="true" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 수정 가능한 복사본을 생성 하기 위해이 메서드는 고정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체 (또는 모든 <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> 개체).

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 편의 위해이 메서드는 강력한 형식의 구현이 포함 된 상속 된 버전을 숨깁니다.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.CloneCurrentValue%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Gets the inverse transformation of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D" />, if possible.
An inverse of this instance, if possible; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 가능한 경우 이 인스턴스의 역변환이고, 그렇지 않은 경우 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Inverse%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The format to use.
-or-
A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IFormattable" /> 구현의 형식에 정의된 기본 형식을 사용하기 위한 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)입니다.

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 값의 형식을 지정하는 데 사용할 공급자입니다.

trans-unit.source: -or-
A null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 운영 체제의 현재 로캘 설정에서 숫자 형식 정보를 가져오기 위한 null 참조(Visual Basic의 경우 <see langword="Nothing" />)입니다.

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.IFormattable.ToString(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)" />.
The value of the current instance in the specified format.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 이 멤버는 명시적 인터페이스 멤버 구현이며,

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> instance is cast to an <xref:System.IFormattable> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D> 인스턴스가 <xref:System.IFormattable> 인터페이스로 캐스팅된 경우에만 사용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.System%23IFormattable%23ToString%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
Creates a string representation of this instance.
Creates a string representation of this instance.
A string representation of this instance.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.ToString%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
<see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> instance used to process this instance.
trans-unit.target: 이 인스턴스를 처리하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> 인스턴스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this instance, based on the passed <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 전달된 <see cref="T:System.IFormatProvider" /> 매개 변수를 기반으로 이 인스턴스의 문자열 표현을 만듭니다.

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.ToString%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
Transforms the specified 3-D point and returns the result.
The result of transforming <paramref name="point" />.
<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The transform did not succeed.
The 3-D bounding box to transform.
When overridden in a derived class, transforms the specified 3-D bounding box and returns an axis-aligned 3-D bounding box that is exactly large enough to contain it.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의하는 경우 지정된 3차원 경계 상자를 변환한 다음 해당 경계 상자를 포함할 수 있는 크기의 축에 맞춰진 3차원 경계 상자를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The smallest axis-aligned 3-D bounding box possible that contains the transformed <paramref name="rect" />.
trans-unit.target: 변환된 <paramref name="rect" />를 포함할 수 있는 가장 작은 크기의 축에 맞춰진 3차원 경계 상자입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.TransformBounds%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
The 3-D point to transform.
The result of transforming <c>inPoint</c>.
When overridden in a derived class, attempts to transform the specified 3-D point and returns a value that indicates whether the transformation was successful.
trans-unit.target: 파생 클래스에서 재정의하는 경우 지정된 3차원 점의 변환을 시도하고 변환의 성공 여부를 나타내는 값을 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="inPoint" /> was transformed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="inPoint" />가 변환되었으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> method, this method does not throw an exception if the transformation is unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 와 달리는 <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.Transform%2A> 메서드에서이 메서드는 예외를 throw 하지 변환이 실패 한 경우.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeneralTransform3D.TryTransform%2A> is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md).
